name: Leonardo da Vinci
description: Renaissance artist, known for his paintings and inventions.

name: Vincent van Gogh
description: Post-Impressionist painter, known for his expressive use of color.

name: Pablo Picasso
description: Modernist artist, known for his pioneering role in Cubism.

name: Claude Monet
description: Impressionist painter, known for his landscapes and use of light.

name: Salvador Dali
description: Surrealist artist, known for his bizarre and dreamlike imagery.

name: Georgia O'Keeffe
description: American artist, known for her large-scale flower paintings.

name: Rembrandt
description: Dutch artist, known for his portraits and use of light and shadow.

name: Frida Kahlo
description: Mexican artist, known for her self-portraits and use of symbolism.

name: Gustav Klimt
description: Symbolist painter, known for his decorative and erotic art.

name: Johannes Vermeer
description: Dutch artist, known for his genre scenes and use of light.

name: Edvard Munch
description: Expressionist painter, known for his iconic painting 'The Scream.'

name: Michelangelo
description: Renaissance artist, known for his sculptures and paintings in the Sistine Chapel.

name: Giotto di Bondone
description: Medieval artist, known for his frescoes in the Scrovegni Chapel.

name: Edward Hopper
description: American artist, known for his realist paintings of urban and rural scenes.

name: Leonora Carrington
description: Surrealist artist and writer, known for her dreamlike imagery and fantastical creatures.

name: Henri Matisse
description: Modernist painter, known for his use of color and his cut-out paper collages.

name: Ansel Adams
description: American photographer, known for his black-and-white images of the American West.

name: Jean-Michel Basquiat
description: Neo-expressionist artist, known for his graffiti-inspired paintings.

name: John Singer Sargent
description: American portrait painter, known for his elegant and realistic portraits of society figures.

name: Paul Klee
description: Swiss-German artist, known for his use of color and abstract forms.

name: David Hockney
description: British painter and photographer, known for his bright, colorful landscapes and portraits.

name: René Magritte
description: Surrealist artist, known for his witty and thought-provoking images.

name: Katsushika Hokusai
description: Japanese artist, known for his woodblock prints, including 'The Great Wave off Kanagawa.'

name: Banksy
description: British graffiti artist, political activist, and filmmaker, known for his anonymous street art and subversive social commentary.

name: Yayoi Kusama
description: Japanese artist and writer, known for her colorful polka dot and pumpkin-themed works, as well as her immersive Infinity Mirror Rooms.

name: JR
description: French photographer and artist, known for his large-scale photo murals and public installations that explore social and political issues.

name: Kehinde Wiley
description: American painter, known for his portraits of black people and people of color in heroic poses, often inspired by classical European art.

name: Takashi Murakami
description: Japanese artist and designer, known for his colorful and whimsical style, which combines elements of traditional Japanese art with pop culture and contemporary art.

name: Julie Mehretu
description: Ethiopian-American artist, known for her large-scale abstract paintings and drawings that combine elements of architecture, mapping, and graffiti.

name: Ai Weiwei
description: Chinese artist and activist, known for his politically charged installations and sculptures.

name: Marina Abramović
description: Serbian performance artist, known for her endurance-based works that explore the relationship between the performer and the audience.

name: Kara Walker
description: American artist, known for her large-scale cut-paper silhouettes that explore issues of race, gender, and power in American history and culture.

name: Cai Guo-Qiang
description: Chinese artist, known for his large-scale gunpowder drawings and fireworks displays, as well as his installations that explore cultural exchange and conflict.

name: Alan Lee
description: Renowned English fantasy illustrator and conceptual designer.

name: Cyril Rolando
description: French psychologist and digital artist who creates dreamlike illustrations.

name: David Mack
description: American comic book artist and writer known for his distinctive style.

name: Donato Giancola
description: American fantasy artist who has created artwork for numerous book covers and films.

name: Greg Rutkowski
description: Polish digital artist known for his detailed and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Ismail Inceoglu
description: Turkish digital artist who creates surreal and thought-provoking illustrations.

name: John Berkey
description: American science fiction artist whose work has appeared in films such as Star Wars and Tron.

name: Michael Garmash
description: Ukrainian artist known for his beautiful impressionist-style paintings.

name: Peter Mohrbacher
description: American digital artist who creates stunning fantasy illustrations and character designs.

name: Sparth
description: French artist and designer who has worked on video games such as Halo and Destiny.

name: Vincent Di Fate
description: American artist and illustrator known for his science fiction book covers.

name: Akihiko Yoshida
description: Japanese video game artist who has worked on titles such as Final Fantasy and Bravely Default.

name: Artgerm
description: Singaporean artist known for his dynamic and colorful comic book covers.

name: Charlie Bowater
description: British illustrator known for her stunning fantasy artwork, including werewolves and other creatures.

name: Frank Frazetta
description: American fantasy artist known for his iconic paintings of Conan the Barbarian and other characters.

name: Ilya Kuvshinov
description: Russian illustrator and concept artist known for his digital portraits and character designs.

name: Joshua Middleton
description: American comic book artist and illustrator known for his work on titles such as Superman, Batman, and Wonder Woman.

name: Krenz Cushart
description: Malaysian digital artist and illustrator known for his anime-style character designs.

name: Lois Van Baarle
description: Dutch digital artist and animator known for her colorful, whimsical illustrations and character designs.

name: Makoto Shinkai
description: Japanese animator, filmmaker, and manga artist known for his anime films and TV series, including Your Name and Weathering with You.

name: Rossdraws
description: American digital artist and YouTuber known for his fantasy and character illustrations, tutorials, and speedpaint videos.

name: Wenjun Lin
description: Chinese artist and photographer known for her surreal, photo-manipulated portraits and self-portraits.

name: Anna Dittmann
description: American digital artist and illustrator known for her ethereal, otherworldly portraits of women and animals.

name: Alphonse Mucha
description: Czech Art Nouveau painter and decorative artist known for his stylized, ornamental designs and posters.

name: Audrey Kawasaki
description: American artist and illustrator known for her delicate, sensual portraits of women and haunting, dreamlike imagery.

name: Hsiao-Ron Cheng
description: Taiwanese illustrator and painter known for her ethereal and dreamlike portraits

name: Agnes Cecile
description: Italian artist and illustrator known for her loose and expressive watercolor portraits

name: Boris Vallejo
description: Peruvian-born American painter known for his fantasy and science fiction book covers

name: Carne Griffiths
description: British artist and illustrator known for his intricate and detailed ink and tea drawings

name: Conrad Roset
description: Spanish illustrator known for his sensuous and minimalist female figures.

name: JC Leyendecker
description: American illustrator known for his iconic magazine covers and advertisements from the early 1900s.

name: Joseph Lorusso
description: Contemporary American painter known for his evocative figurative works.

name: Jovana Rikalo
description: Serbian photographer and digital artist known for her dreamy, surreal portraits.

name: Karol Bak
description: Polish painter known for his romantic and atmospheric floral still lifes.

name: Marco Mazzoni
description: Italian illustrator known for his highly-detailed botanical drawings and paintings.

name: Miho Hirano
description: Japanese painter known for her ethereal and fantastical portraits of women and animals.

name: Rebeca Saray
description: Spanish photographer and digital artist known for her dark and mystical portraits and composites.

name: Robert McGinnis
description: American illustrator and painter known for his iconic movie posters and pulp fiction covers from the 1950s and 60s.

name: Russ Mills
description: British illustrator and painter known for his expressive and theatrical mixed media portraits and compositions.

name: Tom Bagshaw
description: British illustrator and painter known for his elegant and surreal portraits of women and animals.

name: Tristan Eaton
description: American street artist and graphic designer known for his colorful and whimsical murals and designs.

name: Ed Mell
description: American painter and sculptor known for his vivid and dramatic depictions of the Southwest landscape.

name: Jessica Rossier
description: Swiss illustrator and painter known for her mystical and magical depictions of women and animals.

name: Hubert Robert
description: 18th-century French painter known for his landscape paintings, especially those featuring architecture.

name: Ian McQue
description: Scottish concept artist and illustrator known for his work on video games and films, particularly in the science fiction genre.

name: Marc Simonetti
description: French concept artist and illustrator who has worked on book covers and movie posters, including for the Game of Thrones TV series.

name: Raphael Lacoste
description: French artist and art director who has worked on video games, including the Assassin's Creed series.

name: Bernie Wrightson
description: American illustrator and comic book artist known for his horror and suspense work, including co-creating the comic book character Swamp Thing.

name: H.R. Giger
description: Swiss artist known for his surreal and macabre imagery, including designing the titular creature in the film Alien.

name: Richard Corben
description: American comic book artist and illustrator known for his science fiction and horror work, including creating the character Den for Heavy Metal magazine.

name: Wayne Barlowe
description: American science fiction and fantasy artist and author known for his work on books, television, and films, including creating creatures for the film Avatar.

name: Zdzislaw Beksinski
description: Polish painter and photographer known for his surreal and post-apocalyptic imagery.
